moves.name: Arm Thrust
moves.effect: Hits 2 to 5 times.

moves.name: Aura Sphere
moves.effect: This move cannot miss.

moves.name: Body Press
moves.effect: Uses the user's Vitality instead of Strength for the damage roll.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.effect: Destroys any active Light Screen or Reflect on the target's side of the field.

moves.name: Bulk Up
moves.effect: The user raises its Strength and Vitality by 1 for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Circle Throw
moves.effect: Forces the target to switch out with another Pokémon in their party. In a wild battle, this ends the encounter.

moves.name: Close Combat
moves.effect: After use, the user's Vitality and Insight are lowered by 1.

moves.name: Counter
moves.effect: If the user is hit by a physical attack this round, they deal double the received damage back to the attacker. This move has negative Priority.

moves.name: Cross Chop
moves.effect: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Detect
moves.effect: The user becomes immune to all damage and effects until its next turn. Functionally identical to Protect.

moves.name: Double Kick
moves.effect: Hits twice.

moves.name: Drain Punch
moves.effect: The user regains HP equal to half the damage dealt.

moves.name: Dynamic Punch
moves.effect: Very high chance to miss. On a hit, the target is always Confused.

moves.name: Final Gambit
moves.effect: The user faints after using this move.

moves.name: Flying Press
moves.effect: This move deals both Fighting and Flying type damage.

moves.name: Focus Blast
moves.effect: High chance to miss. On a hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Insight is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.effect: Raises the user's critical hit chance for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Focus Punch
moves.effect: The user focuses at the start of the turn. If hit before it can attack, the user flinches and loses its turn. This move has negative Priority.

moves.name: Force Palm
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Paralyzed.

moves.name: Hammer Arm
moves.effect: After using this move, the user's Dexterity is lowered by 1.

moves.name: High Jump Kick
moves.effect: If this move misses, the user takes crash damage equal to half of its maximum HP.

moves.name: Jump Kick
moves.effect: If this move misses, the user takes crash damage.

moves.name: Karate Chop
moves.effect: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Low Kick
moves.effect: Damage depends on the weight of the target.

moves.name: Low Sweep
moves.effect: Lowers the target's Dexterity by 1.

moves.name: Mach Punch
moves.effect: This move has Priority.

moves.name: Mat Block
moves.effect: Protects the user and its allies from damaging moves for one turn. Can only be used on the first turn the user is in battle.

moves.name: Meteor Assault
moves.effect: The user cannot act on the next turn.

moves.name: Power-Up Punch
moves.effect: On a successful hit, the user's Strength is raised by 1.

moves.name: Quick Guard
moves.effect: Protects the user and its allies from Priority moves for one turn.

moves.name: Revenge
moves.effect: If the user was damaged by the target this turn, this move's damage is doubled.

moves.name: Reversal
moves.effect: Damage increases as the user's HP gets lower.

moves.name: Rock Smash
moves.effect: On a hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target's Vitality is lowered by 1. Can break cracked rocks out of combat.

moves.name: Rolling Kick
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target Flinches.

moves.name: Sacred Sword
moves.effect: This move ignores any changes to the target's Vitality and Evasion stats.

moves.name: Seismic Toss
moves.effect: Deals damage equal to the user's Rank multiplied by 5.

moves.name: Sky Uppercut
moves.effect: Can hit Pokémon that are in the middle of using Fly or Bounce.

moves.name: Storm Throw
moves.effect: This move always results in a critical hit.

moves.name: Submission
moves.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to one-quarter of the damage it deals.

moves.name: Superpower
moves.effect: After use, the user's Strength and Vitality are lowered by 1.

moves.name: Triple Arrows
moves.effect: High critical hit ratio. Lowers the target's Vitality by 1.

moves.name: Vacuum Wave
moves.effect: This move has Priority.

moves.name: Victory Dance
moves.effect: Raises the user's Strength, Vitality, and Dexterity by 1.

moves.name: Vital Throw
moves.effect: This move cannot miss but has negative Priority.

moves.name: Wake-Up Slap
moves.effect: If the target is Asleep, this move's damage is doubled, but the target is woken up.

moves.name: Wide Guard
moves.effect: Protects the user and its allies from moves that hit multiple targets for one turn.
